commit message: Fix crash when uninstalled app removed from App List.

Fix shake listener not unregistering after utterance.

-Allowed shake message to apply in Log long after speaking completed.
-Possible cause of excessive battery drain reported by a couple users.

Significantly improve shake detection accuracy.

-Fixes erratic detection even when stationary.
-Users may need to readjust sensitivity setting.

Bump version & change install location to internalOnly.

Fix derp in last commit that broke shake.
